response.overview: Evan, a young man, faces ridicule for being a virgin and never having been in a fight. After a particularly humiliating incident, he decides to confront one of these challenges-but it won't be losing his virginity. Instead, he takes to the streets, offering random strangers ten dollars to punch him in the face.
response.tagline: Everyoneâ€™s got their way of growing up. His just hurts more.
response.title: One Punch
